name: se_project_express
description: Over the last two sprints, you built the front end for your "WTWR" project. The back-end projects will focus on creating a server for "WTWR". While working on this, you'll learn how to work with databases, set up security and testing, and deploy your web application on a remote machine. The goal of all this is to create a server with an API and user authorization.
author: Billy
